title: Missionary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to invite to the Hallowed grounds during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The player you invite will be roleblocked through immunity. They can, however, be visited.
- You may converse with your prisoner anonymously. You will appear to be the Jailor, or if he is dead, the Missionary.
- You may execute your prisoner. You have one execution.
- If you execute an enemy player, the Saint will gain a Saint point.
- You cannot attack on Night One or Night Two.
- Gain access to the Hallow factional kill if you are the last Hallow player alive. Lose if it another player becomes a non-espionage Hallow role by any means.
